title: How to find a book for a 10-year-old about stepmoms or blended families - Quora

response.answer_text: Use a search engine (e.g. Google, Duckduckgo, Ecosia… etc) and search for “young adult fiction with positive blended family” or “young adult fiction with positive step-mother role model”If you think they’re too young for adult fiction then there’s this website that has featured ages:One Step at a Time: 13 Books About Blended Families | Brightly I’d also recommend the kids TV show Steven Universe. There are single parents and a blended family in the show. The episode Drop Beat Dad (season 3, episode 7) features a teenager’s biological dad coming back, letting him down, and his step-dad stepping up and saving his DJ set… If you’re looking for non-fiction then I’m not sure. Does a 10-year old in 2018 need a book explaining what a step-mother is? I’d say that it’s best just to talk to the child with your husband (or partner if you’re not married) and see how they feel.
